seed_pair.target: She said that she needs to read the same book.
seed_pair.known: Ella dijo que necesita leer el mismo libro.

seed_pair.target: He said that he doesn't need to walk to school.
seed_pair.known: Él dijo que no necesita caminar a la escuela.

seed_pair.target: That student has both of her hands up.
seed_pair.known: Esa estudiante tiene las dos manos arriba.

seed_pair.target: I think that he needs to consider ten possible problems.
seed_pair.known: Creo que necesita considerar diez problemas posibles.

seed_pair.target: I don't think that she needs to sell the company.
seed_pair.known: No creo que necesite vender la compañía.

seed_pair.target: Do you think that she needs to offer another way?
Yes I think she ought to.
No I don't think it's very important.
seed_pair.known: No, no creo que sea muy importante.
